product_name: SportHill Arctic Pullover Hoodie - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The SportHill Arctic Pullover hoodie for women combats the cold while you enjoy a walk or run thanks to its wind-resistant, moisture-wicking fabric. Stretchy fabric moves with you during activity, resists the wind, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Hood features a stretch drawcord for a perfect fit. Zip neck for easy on and adjustable ventilation. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Side pocket for stashing a key. Special buy.
short_description: The SportHill Arctic Pullover hoodie for women combats the cold while you enjoy a walk or run thanks to its wind-resistant, moisture-wicking fabric.
